title: SolarFire Gold v7.0.1 plus update
description:

Other new goodies include a pop-up birthday reminder . . . . . . 1000+ new timed, sourced, Rodden-rated and categorized celebrity charts . . . instant switching between Mean/True nodes and Tropical/Sidereal zodiacs . . . the ability to select a different chart without leaving the chart view screen or info listing . . . a full ACS Atlas that you now can add to . . .and enhanced Vista compatibility.



This is a valid license + update to v7.0.6. Read the included "note" text file.

enjoy!



NOTE: There's an update to SF v7.0.9 on Alabe's update page

IMPORTANT: To install the updates on SF7 you have to "uncompress" the .exe files that you get from the update page (I use WinRAR):

1- Create a new folder with any name (ex Solar707)

2- In this folder extract (uncompress) sf707.exe (15.8mb) which is a self-extracting archive

3- Copy all the uncompressed files to SolarFire's directory: 
Program Files/ Esoteric Technologies/ Solar Fire Demo/ v7


NOTE: If the self-extracting archive is in the same folder as the uncompressed files, delete it before you copy the files to the program directory.
